burialSiteTypeManagementDescription: Manage burial site types and fields associated with them.
configTableManagementDescription: Manage simple configuration tables for work order types and burial site statuses.
contractTypeManagementDescription: Manage contract types, the fields associated with them, and their available print options.
databaseMaintenanceDescription: Backup the database before making significant updates. Permanently delete records that have been previously deleted from the database.
feeManagementDescription: Manage fees for contracts and specific burial site types.
someUsersAreConfiguredInTheConfigFile: Some users are configured in the application config file and will not appear in this table.
